resources.string: To record data over a long period of time, this app must be able run in the background without being killed by Android\'s battery optimizations. Please allow myPowerSpy to run in the background.
This mode must access your location. Please enable the phone\'s location services and restart the recording.
Not all permission requirements are met. Please grant the missing permission(s) in the following prompt(s) and restart the recording.
This app relies on access to your location to record your current position as well as the connected cell tower. Please grant access to your location.
"To record data about connected cell towers and the current location, this app must have access to your location. Please change the app\'s location permission to \'Allow all the time\'."
Collects all data on one phone. Please do not lock the phone or leave the app in this mode.
Run each of the following modes on one phone.
Logs the phone\'s battery consumption while creating dummy network traffic (1KB/s).
Logs the phone\'s location, received signal strength and the currently connected cell tower. Please do not lock the phone or leave the app in this mode.
